meanings.definition: Of or relating to a stylite.
meanings.sent1: The stylitic robes worn by the monk were simple and plain.
meanings.sent2: The stylitic artwork in the monastery was admired for its beauty.
meanings.sent3: The stylitic monk accidentally spilled ink on his robes while writing.
meanings.sent4: Her stylitic approach to interior design was minimalist and elegant.
meanings.sent5: The stylitic architecture of the ancient temple was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A person who lives on top of a pillar.
meanings.sent1: The stylitic remained atop the pillar for years in deep contemplation.
meanings.sent2: Visitors were amazed by the dedication of the stylitic living on the pillar.
meanings.sent3: The stylitic on the pillar waved to the crowd below with a smile.
meanings.sent4: The stylitic on the pillar seemed like a solitary figure against the sky.
meanings.sent5: The stylitic on the pillar inspired many with his spiritual devotion.
